oai_dc:dc.dc:title: P. B. Newman voter registration
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Voter registration for P. B. Newman, Co. G, 43rd Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. P. B. Newman was born in Jefferson County, Tennessee, in 1843. He enlisted in October of 1862 and served through the end of the war in April 1865.; Newman married Elizabeth Wilson in McMinn County on November 7, 1872. He died on March 7, 1908.
